googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingNotesCombined: Washington is all vote by mail. People can vote in person during the voting period during which ballots are mailed.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRulesCombined: Washington elections are all vote-by-mail.  You can still request a one-time absentee ballot if you will be away from home during a specific election.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: Washington voters must include their Washington driver's license number or state ID number with their online voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Washington voters must provide their Washington driver's license number, state ID number, or the last four digits of their social security number with their voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingInPersonInfoCombined: Washington is all vote by mail. People can vote in person during the voting period during which ballots are mailed.
